Title: AN ACT TO CHANGE THE NAME OF THE WEST CENTRAL SCHOOL OF VIGAN, ILOCOS SUR, TO BURGOS MEMORIAL SCHOOL.
Data:
[ Act No. 4080, November 29, 1933 ]
AN ACT TO CHANGE THE NAME OF THE WEST CENTRAL SCHOOL OF VIGAN, ILOCOS SUR, TO BURGOS MEMORIAL SCHOOL.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines inLegislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The West Central School of Vigan, Ilocos Sur, shall hereafter be known as the Burgos Memorial School.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, November 29, 1933.
